stories.title: The Curious Case of the Weapon That Didn’t Exist (2016)

stories.text:
There used to be a Hacker News page on Facebook, automatically posting the top 5 submissions from the front page. It has been useful for people like me who are on both platforms.

It seems to have disappeared recently. Any idea why? If the maintainer is reading this, could you please restore it?
stories.title: Ask HN: What happened to Hacker News page on Facebook?

stories.text: It seems, based on submissions & comments I've read here over the past several months, that many of you are anticipating a major economic downturn in the near future. What steps are you all taking to prepare for such an event? How can one hedge against the risk of a stock market crash, housing crash, and inflation all at the same time?
stories.title: Ask HN: How are you preparing for a changing economic tide?
